column5: Once the second lockdown is played, every other player gets one more turn
Switch this stack of cards with the opposite one
This card's value is worth twice the card below it
Any card can be played over this one
Reshuffle your hand
The board cannot be spun until the next round
Reshuffle any card on the board back into the deck.
Trade a card in your hand for a random card in an opponent's hand
Trade hands with another player
Each player takes a random card from the player to their left, starting from the caster.
Each player shuffles one card back into the deck
Play a second card this turn
Switch the order of turns
You can play any amount of cards this turn
Pick two opponents who must swap hands
Reshuffle target tower
Adjacent towers subtract from player scores, rather than add.
For the next round, all spins are reversed
For the next round, all spins are doubled
You can play an additional card anywhere on the board this turn.
All other players draw a  card
Reorder all towers
Draw a card
Echo's spin is equal to the cost of the card below it.
